artist: Artist: David Rathman; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: One-color intaglio printed in dark brown ink. Techniques used were sugar-lift, lifted screenprinting (text), spit-bite aquatint, scraping, burnishing, plus "found/existing" drypoint scratches. The plate was printed with plate tone according to artist's directions.
image_copyright: Copyright © David Rathman%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings: LR margin in pencil: ARCHIVE | Publisher\'s blindstamp, LL margin: HP
medium: Sugar-lift aquatint, spit-bite aquatint, screenprinitng (text), scraping, burnishing, drypoint (existing plate scratches), and plate tone printed in dark brown ink
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: BC margin in pencil: David Rathman 2002
title: Montana’s Killing Me
